cambalache-catalog.name: gdk
cambalache-catalog.type_enum: ("GdkAxisUse","GDK_AXIS_DELTA_X","delta-x",3,"the axis is used as the scroll x delta"), ("GdkAxisUse","GDK_AXIS_DELTA_Y","delta-y",4,"the axis is used as the scroll y delta"), ("GdkAxisUse","GDK_AXIS_DISTANCE","distance",9,"the axis is used for pen/tablet distance information"), ("GdkAxisUse","GDK_AXIS_IGNORE","ignore",None,"the axis is ignored."), ("GdkAxisUse","GDK_AXIS_LAST","last",12,"a constant equal to the numerically highest axis value."), ("GdkAxisUse","GDK_AXIS_PRESSURE","pressure",5,"the axis is used for pressure information."), ("GdkAxisUse","GDK_AXIS_ROTATION","rotation",10,"the axis is used for pen rotation information"), ("GdkAxisUse","GDK_AXIS_SLIDER","slider",11,"the axis is used for pen slider information"), ("GdkAxisUse","GDK_AXIS_WHEEL","wheel",8,"the axis is used for wheel information."), ("GdkAxisUse","GDK_AXIS_X","x",1,"the axis is used as the x axis."), ("GdkAxisUse","GDK_AXIS_XTILT","xtilt",6,"the axis is used for x tilt information."), ("GdkAxisUse","GDK_AXIS_Y","y",2,"the axis is used as the y axis."), ("GdkAxisUse","GDK_AXIS_YTILT","ytilt",7,"the axis is used for y tilt information."), ("GdkCrossingMode","GDK_CROSSING_DEVICE_SWITCH","device-switch",8,"crossing because of a device switch (i.e. a mouse taking control of the pointer after a touch device), this event is synthetic as the pointer didnâ€™t leave the surface."), ("GdkCrossingMode","GDK_CROSSING_GRAB","grab",1,"crossing because a grab is activated."), ("GdkCrossingMode","GDK_CROSSING_GTK_GRAB","gtk-grab",3,"crossing because a GTK grab is activated."), ("GdkCrossingMode","GDK_CROSSING_GTK_UNGRAB","gtk-ungrab",4,"crossing because a GTK grab is deactivated."), ("GdkCrossingMode","GDK_CROSSING_NORMAL","normal",None,"crossing because of pointer motion."), ("GdkCrossingMode","GDK_CROSSING_STATE_CHANGED","state-changed",5,"crossing because a GTK widget changed state (e.g. sensitivity)."), ("GdkCrossingMode","GDK_CROSSING_TOUCH_BEGIN","touch-begin",6,"crossing because a touch sequence has begun, this event is synthetic as the pointer might have not left the surface."), ("GdkCrossingMode","GDK_CROSSING_TOUCH_END","touch-end",7,"crossing because a touch sequence has ended, this event is synthetic as the pointer might have not left the surface."), ("GdkCrossingMode","GDK_CROSSING_UNGRAB","ungrab",2,"crossing because a grab is deactivated."), ("GdkDevicePadFeature","GDK_DEVICE_PAD_FEATURE_BUTTON","button",None,"a button"), ("GdkDevicePadFeature","GDK_DEVICE_PAD_FEATURE_RING","ring",1,"a ring-shaped interactive area"), ("GdkDevicePadFeature","GDK_DEVICE_PAD_FEATURE_STRIP","strip",2,"a straight interactive area"), ("GdkDeviceToolType","GDK_DEVICE_TOOL_TYPE_AIRBRUSH","airbrush",5,"Tool is an airbrush stylus."), ("GdkDeviceToolType","GDK_DEVICE_TOOL_TYPE_BRUSH","brush",3,"Tool is a brush stylus."), ("GdkDeviceToolType","GDK_DEVICE_TOOL_TYPE_ERASER","eraser",2,"Tool is standard tablet eraser."), ("GdkDeviceToolType","GDK_DEVICE_TOOL_TYPE_LENS","lens",7,"Tool is a lens cursor."), ("GdkDeviceToolType","GDK_DEVICE_TOOL_TYPE_MOUSE","mouse",6,"Tool is a mouse."), ("GdkDeviceToolType","GDK_DEVICE_TOOL_TYPE_PEN","pen",1,"Tool is a standard tablet stylus."), ("GdkDeviceToolType","GDK_DEVICE_TOOL_TYPE_PENCIL","pencil",4,"Tool is a pencil stylus."), ("GdkDeviceToolType","GDK_DEVICE_TOOL_TYPE_UNKNOWN","unknown",None,"Tool is of an unknown type."), ("GdkDragCancelReason","GDK_DRAG_CANCEL_ERROR","error",2,"Unspecified error."), ("GdkDragCancelReason","GDK_DRAG_CANCEL_NO_TARGET","no-target",None,"There is no suitable drop target."), ("GdkDragCancelReason","GDK_DRAG_CANCEL_USER_CANCELLED","user-cancelled",1,"Drag cancelled by the user"), ("GdkEventType","GDK_BUTTON_PRESS","button-press",2,"a mouse button has been pressed."), ("GdkEventType","GDK_BUTTON_RELEASE","button-release",3,"a mouse button has been released."), ("GdkEventType","GDK_DELETE","delete",None,"the window manager has requested that the toplevel surface be hidden or destroyed, usually when the user clicks on a special icon in the title bar."), ("GdkEventType","GDK_DRAG_ENTER","drag-enter",11,"the mouse has entered the surface while a drag is in progress."), ("GdkEventType","GDK_DRAG_LEAVE","drag-leave",12,"the mouse has left the surface while a drag is in progress."), ("GdkEventType","GDK_DRAG_MOTION","drag-motion",13,"the mouse has moved in pointer has entered the surface."), ("GdkEventType","GDK_EVENT_LAST","event-last",28,"marks the end of the GdkEventType enumeration."), ("GdkEventType","GDK_FOCUS_CHANGE","focus-change",8,"the has been pressed."), ("GdkEventType","GDK_KEY_RELEASE","key-release",5,"a key has been released."), ("GdkEventType","GDK_LEAVE_NOTIFY","leave-notify",7,"the pointer has left the surface."), ("GdkEventType","GDK_PAD_RING","pad-ring",25,"A tablet pad axis event from a \"ring\"."), ("GdkEventType","GDK_PAD_STRIP","pad-strip",26,"A tablet pad axis event from a \"strip\"."), ("GdkEventType","GDK_PROXIMITY_IN","proximity-in",9,"an input device has moved into contact with a sensing surface (e.g. a touchscreen or graphics tablet)."), ("GdkEventType","GDK_PROXIMITY_OUT","proximity-out",10,"an input device has moved out of contact with a sensing surface."), ("GdkEventType","GDK_SCROLL","scroll",15,"the scroll wheel was turned"), ("GdkEventType","GDK_TOUCHPAD_PINCH","touchpad-pinch",22,"A touchpad pinch gesture event, the current state is determined by its phase field."), ("GdkGravity","GDK_GRAVITY_WEST","west",4,"the reference point is at the middle of the left edge."), ("GdkInputSource","GDK_SOURCE_KEYBOARD","keyboard",2,"the device is a keyboard."), ("GdkInputSource","GDK_SOURCE_MOUSE","mouse",None,"the device is a mouse. (This will be reported for the core pointer, even if it is something else, such as a trackball.)"), ("GdkInputSource","GDK_SOURCE_PEN","pen",1,"the device is a stylus of a graphics tablet or similar device."), ("GdkInputSource","GDK_SOURCE_TABLET_PAD","tablet-pad",6,"the device is a \"pad\", a collection of buttons, rings and strips found in drawing tablets"), ("GdkInputSource","GDK_SOURCE_TOUCHPAD","touchpad",4,"the device is an indirect touch device, such as a touchpad"), ("GdkInputSource","GDK_SOURCE_TOUCHSCREEN","touchscreen",3,"the device is a direct-input touch device, such as a touchscreen or tablet"), ("GdkInputSource","GDK_SOURCE_TRACKPOINT","trackpoint",5,"the device is a trackpoint"), ("GdkKeyMatch","GDK_KEY_MATCH_EXACT","exact",2,"The key event matches"), ("GdkKeyMatch","GDK_KEY_MATCH_NONE","none",None,"The key event does not match"), ("GdkKeyMatch","GDK_KEY_MATCH_PARTIAL","partial",1,"The key event matches if keyboard state (specifically, the currently active group) is ignored"), ("GdkMemoryFormat","GDK_MEMORY_A8B8G8R8","a8b8g8r8",6,"4 bytes; for alpha, blue, green, red."), ("GdkMemoryFormat","GDK_MEMORY_A8R8G8B8","a8r8g8b8",4,"4 bytes; for alpha, red, green, blue."), ("GdkMemoryFormat","GDK_MEMORY_A8R8G8B8_PREMULTIPLIED","a8r8g8b8-premultiplied",1,"4 bytes; for alpha, red, green, blue. This value will change as more formats get added, so do not rely on its concrete integer."), ("GdkMemoryFormat","GDK_MEMORY_R8G8B8","r8g8b8",7,"3 bytes; for red, green, blue. The data is opaque."), ("GdkMemoryFormat","GDK_MEMORY_R8G8B8A8","r8g8b8a8",5,"4 bytes; for red, green, blue, alpha."), ("GdkMemoryFormat","GDK_MEMORY_R8G8B8A8_PREMULTIPLIED","r8g8b8a8-premultiplied",2,"4 bytes; for red, green, blue, alpha The color values are premultiplied with the alpha value."), ("GdkNotifyType","GDK_NOTIFY_ANCESTOR","ancestor",None,"the surface is entered from an ancestor or left towards an ancestor."), ("GdkNotifyType","GDK_NOTIFY_INFERIOR","inferior",2,"the surface is entered from an inferior or left towards an inferior."), ("GdkNotifyType","GDK_NOTIFY_NONLINEAR","nonlinear",3,"the surface is entered from or left towards a surface which is neither an ancestor nor an inferior."), ("GdkNotifyType","GDK_NOTIFY_NONLINEAR_VIRTUAL","nonlinear-virtual",4,"the pointer moves between two surfaces which are not ancestors of each other and the surface is part of the ancestor chain between one of these surfaces and their least common ancestor."), ("GdkNotifyType","GDK_NOTIFY_UNKNOWN","unknown",5,"an unknown type of enter/leave event occurred."), ("GdkNotifyType","GDK_NOTIFY_VIRTUAL","virtual",1,"the pointer moves between an ancestor and an inferior of the surface."), ("GdkScrollDirection","GDK_SCROLL_DOWN","down",1,"the surface is scrolled down."), ("GdkScrollDirection","GDK_SCROLL_LEFT","left",2,"the surface is scrolled to the left."), ("GdkScrollDirection","GDK_SCROLL_RIGHT","right",3,"the surface is scrolled to the right."), ("GdkScrollDirection","GDK_SCROLL_SMOOTH","smooth",4,"the scrolling is determined by the delta values in scroll events. ("GdkSubpixelLayout","GDK_SUBPIXEL_LAYOUT_NONE","none",1,"Not organized in this way"), ("GdkSubpixelLayout","GDK_SUBPIXEL_LAYOUT_UNKNOWN","unknown",None,"The layout is not known"),
